import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import useCartContext from "../../store/CartContext"; import { createBuyOrder} from "../../data/index"; import Swal from "sweetalert2"; function CartView() { const {cart, removeFromCart, clearCart,restaItems, calcPriceCart , agregaItems, } = useCartContext(); function handleBuy(){ const itemsToBuy = cart.map((item) => ( { title: item.title, price: item.precio, cant: item.cant, id: item.id, } )) const buyOrder = { buyer:{ name: document.getElementById("nombre").value, email: document.getElementById("email").value, phone: document.getElementById("tel").value, }, items: itemsToBuy, total: calcPriceCart(), } createBuyOrder(buyOrder) } const infoBuyer = () => { if (document.getElementById("nombre").value === "" || document.getElementById("email").value === "" || document.getElementById("tel").value === "") { Swal.fire({ title: `Por favor complete todos los campos`, icon: 'error', showCancelButton: false, }) } else { handleBuy() } } if (cart.length === 0){ return

No hay items en en el carrito

Volver para comprar
}else{ return

Shopping Cart

{cart.length} Items

Product Details

Quantity

Price

Total

{cart.map(itemCart => { return
{itemCart.title} {itemCart.description}
{itemCart.cant}
$ {itemCart.precio} `$ {itemCart.precio * itemCart.cant} `
})}

Order Summary

Items {cart.length} $ {calcPriceCart()}
Total Compra $ {calcPriceCart() }
infoBuyer()} to='/' className="btn btn-xs sm:btn-sm md:btn-md lg:btn-lg btn-error"> Checkout
} } export default CartView
